Or Sandy the Giantess squirrel?

113.content: Spongebob had invented a growth ray and blasted Sandy 5 times. With the delay, he waited until his timer beeped. "I'm late for work!" said Spongebob. Spongebob went to the Krusty Krab, where he is the fry cook. When Spongebob went home from work, he found Sandy, now a giantess squirrel. Standing 110' tall, Sandy replied, "What happened?" "Uh-oh," said Spongebob. Sandy said, "Oh, it's you. Hey, doesn't this thing have a shrinking feature?" "No," said Spongebob. "I thought so," replied Sandy. So she had Spongebob invent the shrink ray. Then what happened?
113.title: Sandy the giantess squirrel.

Then without warning her body began it fill with fat; her belly filled out, her breast got larger, her arms, legs, hips, and feet got thicker., and sandy's booty also puffed out. Her suit and boots stretched with her growing body to accommodate and spongebob was getting a nice view of it unfolding . She finally stopped growing and sandy was at a lost for words.

choices: McGee's job got a lot harder.
1531.content: Agent Gibbs and Agent McGee were talking. "What are you doing today?" asked Gibbs. "My work has gotten harder & harder & harder," replied McGee. "Late last night someone drank a chemical and grew too tall. I need to see proof of this..." "Proof, eh?" said Gibbs. "Here's your proof!" He handed McGee a picture of an enlarged 12-year old girl. Gibbs then cut to the chase and said, "She was last seen normal-sized yesterday afternoon, Agent McGee. She sneaked in our laboratory last night and stole our enlargement potion. Then she got thirsty crazy and wanted to down the contents of that very bottle. But she wanted to save the drink for later, but her temptation got the best of her. She drank without noticing, and she felt fine for three hours. In second one, she felt fine. In MINUTE one, she felt fine. In HOUR one, she felt fine. In hour THREE, she felt a sudden growth spurt and grew colossal. That enough of the story, Agent McGee?" But McGee was MAD. Not because he had to arrest a giantess, but his job just got harder. And if his job got harder, he gets very little pay. Eventually they'll just take McGee's paycheck away altogether. He wishes his job got easier for once. But what happened?

He stares up at her, asking "What happened, Mabel?!" then she laughs, showing him the special pink crystal she had found, she says "I went back to the crystal place where you got the stuff for that flashlight Gideon shrank us with before, and found this incredibly rare pink one! According to the book, these are just a myth because of how rare they are!" then she walks over to Dipper, shaking the ground beneath his feet more, he asks "Mabel, why did you use it?!" then she replies with "Cause of your growth spurt! I can't stand being an inch shorter than you!" then she pouts, the pink crystal on a necklace around her neck. She wiggles her bare toes and says "Plus, it feels good to be barefoot, and this gives me an excuse to go barefoot all the time, since my feet are a bit.. Big for shoes!" then she laughs, picking up Dipper and hugging him, he says "Mabel! You've got to do something about being 9 ft tall! It's too big." then...

He gulps, flipping through the book, trying to find a way to reverse her size, but it was impossible. He has a quick thought about a giant Wendy.. But quickly shakes the thought from his head. Mabel laughs and says "I'll be upstairs, brobro." then she starts to walk up the stairs, the shack booming as she walked. The more Dipper looked through the book, the less he found. He goes to walk into his room he shares with Mabel and gasps as she pins him down with her foot, he looks up at her face, asking "What the heck, Mabel?!" then she laughs, saying "I need a nice foot rub~ I know how you do so well with them. Wendy tells me~" then he blushes intensely, starting to rub her giant foot, saying "I've never rubbed a foot this big!" and she gives a booming laugh, stretching her body, causing her to grow to 9'2. 155332222.content: Star Vs The Forces of Evil?
155332222.title: Nah.

choices: Questioned how she got so tall.
1553322221111.content: Star yawns as she wakes up, walking over to her usual measuring spot, she measured herself at the end of every month, trying to see how much she grew. She marks her current height and stares at it, only 5 ft 6, average height for a human female. She pouts, saying "I wish I was just a bit taller.." then she looks down at her wand and grins brightly, picking it up and aiming it at herself, saying "Super growth rainbow!" then she is engulfed in a rainbow, shooting up to 6 ft even. She smiles brightly, stretching her new body, Marco stood 5'8, so she now stood 4 inches taller! She looks down at her boots and pouts, saying "Those were my favorite boots.." as she sees they were totally destroyed by her growth spurt. She walks around a bit and smiles, saying "Ah. Forget the boots. Going barefoot feels awesome!" then she goes to Marco's room, poking him. As he got up, he gasped, seeing her height. He..
1553322221111.title: Story 1.

15533222211111.content: He smiles, looking up at Star, saying "You're looking tall today!" then he hugs her, she smiles, unintentionally lifting him up a little. In a soft, kind tone, she says "I had a growth spurt, Marco~!" then he looks up, saying "A huge growth spurt!" then he walks over to his measuring wall with her. Measuring them both, she smiles, seeing she is 6 ft, and he's 5'8. He asks how tall she had been before the growth spurt, she states "5 ft, 6 inches! I'm 6 inches taller!" then she stretches out, smiling, he asks "Do you want some new boots?" as he looks down, she shakes her head, saying "I don't need them. Being barefoot feels great!" then he shrugs, just accepting it. Next, Star..
15533222211111.title: Loved her new height!

155332222111111.content: She lays in bed and says "Hm.. That's weird. I didn't think my feet would stick THAT far over the edge!" as she stares at her feet, she walks over to the measuring wall and measures herself again, saying "Woah! I grew again! 7 ft tall!" then she grins, thinking of the fact her mom would have to look up at her now. Star stretches out and laughs, saying "I need a new bed!" then she uses her magic to poof up a new one, poofing the old one away. She lays on her new bed and smiles, saying "I really needed a new bed anyways. Now this is a good excuse to have this new bed!" then she..
155332222111111.title: Has unexpected growth!

1553322221111111.content: She falls asleep on her new bed, unbeknownst to her, as she slept, her body slowly grew, stretching out, further she grew, stopping at 8 ft, good thing she made the bed 9 ft long! She yawns, stretching as she wakes up, smiling. She stands up and blinks, noticing her new height. She measures herself again and gasps, seeing that the mark says 8 ft, she squeals happily. Her mom was already quite tall at 6 ft 6, but she'd barely be chest height to Star now! Maybe not even chest height! She runs and tells Marco, who gasps as he sees her new body. He hugs her and says "Nice, Star!"
1553322221111111.title: Grows again!

choices: Time to see what her new 20 ft body can do!
15533222211111111.content: Star smiles, hugging Marco tight, he notices something though.. Weren't his feet touching the ground a minute ago? Star began to crouch, smiling, saying "Marco, I think you're gonna need a bigger room." then they go downstairs, going in the backyard, Star growing the whole way. She smiles bright, looking over her body, the growth slowing to a hault. She was now 20 ft tall! She wiggles her toes and says "I don't think they make boots in my size." with a soft laugh, Marco chuckles, agreeing with her. She kindly asks "Mind seeing how big they are now?" then she sits, putting her foot in front of Marco, he measures her foot and says "6 ft 8 inches!" then she stretches out, smiling, asking Marco if he hopes the growth will start again. He stares at her for a minute, nodding with a smile. And to those wondering about her clothing, her pants had turned into magically expanding shorts, and her top into a crop top of sorts. But they were growing with her.
15533222211111111.title: Star grows more!

155332222111111111.content: Star stretches out and begins to grow again, picking Marco up and hugging him against her growing chest. Further into the sky she stretched. She held him closer, smiling as she passed 40 ft, and kept growing. Inch by inch, foot by foot, she loved every bit of it. Her growth haulted at 60 ft. Her feet a massive 20 ft long! She looks around, staring at the smaller world, just oo-ing and ah-ing.
155332222111111111.title: Star grows again!

choices: Star decides to make Marco grow a little too.
1553322221111111111.content: Star smiles down at Marco, rubbing his head, saying "I think I'm pretty big now." then Marco nods his head and says "Bigger is better!" then he hugs her hand, smiling as she begins to grow again. She stretches out, smiling, stepping into some large fields, Marco stares at the enormous footprints in disbelief, saying "Woah.. Look at the size of those footprints, Star!" and he points at said footprints. She giggles, stretching further into the sky. 150 ft came and went. 250 ft was her new height. She wiggles her toes and says "I guess big feet make big footprints!" with a soft laugh, hugging Marco against her enormous chest.
1553322221111111111.title: More growth!

choices: She plays with her new size!
15533222211111111111.content: Star laughs, saying "I feel a big spurt coming on, Marco!" then she realizes she had dropped Marco. She shrugs, knowing he was safe between breasts. She stretches out, grinning as she saw the footprints in the ground looking smaller as she began growing. Larger, and larger, not seeming like she was going to ever stop growing. She smirks, loving every moment of this, saying "Bigger~ I want to be even bigger!" then her growth speeds up. She tops out at 1 mile. Her feet were larger than oil tankers! She laughs, saying "I think earth is getting a little small for me." And again she grew. 1.2 miles.. 2.5 miles.. 3.4.. 4.6.. Finally stopping at 5 miles! Her feet were slightly under 1.5 miles now!
15533222211111111111.title: Star grows!

15533222211111112.content: The question is, will she try to get shoes? Or go barefoot?
15533222211111112.title: Time for school!

155332222111111121.content: The 8 ft Mewman princess smiles as she ducks under the door, telling Marco "Come on! We need to get to school!" then Marco asks "Don't you need shoes, Star?" and she says "No time! Plus I don't think they make them in my size! My feet were already pretty big before I grew!"
155332222111111121.title: Barefoot!

15533222211111112111.content: Star smiles as she walks into school with Marco. She sits on the floor since the desks were too small. She got a ton of compliments from the other students, and Starfan13 offered to rub Star's feet. Star gives a soft nod, loving the idea. As Starfan13 begins working on Star's feet, Star relaxed with a happy sigh.
15533222211111112111.title: Positively!

choices: Marco's reacts to what she just said!
155332222111111121111.content: Starfan13 noticed something happening. She looks up at Star and asks "Is it me, or are your feet getting bigger?" then Star nods, saying "Yeah! I'm growing again!" and Star wiggles her toes in Starfan13's face. Star's growth stopped at 12 ft tall. Star lifts Marco up and says "You know, Marco, I'm the tallest princess Mewni has ever had!" then Marco says "With magical help." and a smirk. Star rolls her eyes and hugs him, saying "Yeah. Just one thing about it.. This spell isn't reversible." then Marco's eyes opened wide.
155332222111111121111.title: Star grows again!

1553322221111111211111.title: Marco's reacts to what she just said!

15533222211111112111112.content: He gulps as the 12 ft princess holds him, saying "Star.. What if you ever want to shrink down?" then she replies "Why would I? Being big is great!" and he says "What if you get too big?!" then she says "No such thing." and then Marco begins imagining Star, so large that her toes were taller than the tallest mountain in the world.
15533222211111112111112.title: Concern!

choices: Time for Marco to rub Star's feet!
155332222111111121111122.title: Something else!

1553322221111111211111221.content: Star gives Marco an adorable smile and asks "Marcooo~ Could you help Starfan13 and rub my feeeeet?" with a soft smile. Marco shrugs and says "Sure. They're just enormous." as a tease, giving a laugh as he hugs the 12 ft Star. He grabs her 3 ft long left foot and begins rubbing it as Starfan13 rubs the right foot.
1553322221111111211111221.title: Time for Marco to rub Star's feet!

155332222111111121111122121.content:
-Queen Butterfly shall be called by her name, Moon.
A portal opens up in the room as Star was sitting there, a 12 ft girl having her feet rubbed. Moon pops in and gets a good look at Star before saying "My.. We really must get you some bigger boots, Star." then Star laughs and says "Yeah.. I had a bit of a growth spurt, mom." then Marco says "A bit?" and Star pins him down under her foot. Moon laughs a bit before saying "You're definitely the biggest princess in mewman history." and Star's eyes light up.
155332222111111121111122121.title: Queen Butterfly pops in!

1553322221111111211111221211.content: Star began to grow again, pushing 15 ft before her growth stops again, Moon says "Make that biggest AND growing!" as Marco mumbles under the huge foot of the princess. Her feet were over 4 ft 3 inches, Star says "Uh, mom, I don't think it'll be necessary to get boots for me." and Moon raises an eyebrow. Star decides to explain herself and says "I'm growing so fast I would outgrow them before tomorrow! And it feels nice being barefoot!" then she puts her foot in front of Moon and says "Come on mom! Give it a hug! It's clean and soft!" then Moon reluctantly hugs the enormous foot.
1553322221111111211111221211.title: She grows again!

choices: Star asks for another foot hug from Moon.
15533222211111112111112212111.content: Star unintentionally absorbed some magic from Moon when Moon hugged Star's enormous foot. Star begins to grow again. She soon stopped at 25 ft, 10 ft taller than before! Moon blinks and says "Oh my.. That's a big foot." then looks up to see the toes. Star's feet alone were bigger than the tallest princess Mewni has ever had!
15533222211111112111112212111.title: Moon boosts Star's growth unintentionally!

155332222111111121111122121111.title: Star asks for another foot hug from Moon.

choices: Star remembers Marco is under her now 7 ft 2 feet!
155332222111111121111122121112.title: Something else!

1553322221111111211111221211121.content: Star begins to giggle as she feels something tickling her sole. She lifts her foot up and blushes lightly as she says "Uh.. Sorry Marco. Kinda forgot you were under there." then he says "Your feet are bigger than me! I guess that makes it easy to forget!" with a laugh. He wasn't mad.
1553322221111111211111221211121.title: Star remembers Marco is under her now 7 ft 2 feet!

155332222111111121111122121112121.content: Star wiggles her toes, smiling down at Marco, when he asks "Uh.. Star, are you growing again?" then she says "I don't think so, no." and Moon butts in, saying "It appears it's just her feet getting bigger." before Star laughs and says "You always said I had big feet, mom!" then Moon says "Well you always have! Finding shoes that fit you was always hard!" with a soft chuckle. Moon slices open a portal and says "I really must get going. You have fun, Star! And try not to outgrow the earth." with a wink. Star grins and says "I think I should outgrow the earth!" then Marco replies with..
155332222111111121111122121112121.title: Star's feet grow!

1553322221111111211111221211121211.content: Marco lets out an audible gulp before he asks "How much bigger than the earth?" then she says "I want my toes to at least be as big as the earth!" and Marco gulps, imagining Star's toes, as big as the planet, he couldn't help but admire her toes, though. Her feet were big, soft, basically perfect! Plus they smell like candy! He hugs her foot and asks "How about just stopping here at 25 ft tall?"
1553322221111111211111221211121211.title: Concern/worry!

15533222211111112111112212111212112.content: Star shakes her head and says "Sorry, Marco. Once a growth spell is started, it can't be stopped!" and she surges to 40 ft. His thoughts began to change, he says "Well.. Maybe a giant Star won't be too bad." as he hugs her growing feet. Star presses her feet into his body as he smiles.
15533222211111112111112212111212112.title: Star disagrees.

155332222111111121111122121112121121.content: Does she have the wand?
155332222111111121111122121112121121.title: She uses some magic!

1553322221111111211111221211121211211.content: What magic shall she use?
1553322221111111211111221211121211211.title: Yes!

choices: Her spell makes Marco love her growth!
1553322221111111211111221211121211211212.title: Something else!

choices: Marco becomes muscly. (Like in Running With Scissors)
1553322221111111211111221211121211211212.title: Something else!

1553322221111111211111221211121211212.content: Did she accidentally break the wand?
1553322221111111211111221211121211212.title: No!

15533222211111112111112212111212112121.content: She gasps as she sees the remains of the wand under her butt, totally crushed. As she touched the crushed wand, she began to absorb the power. She gasps as she feels the surge of the universe's magic, flowing through her veins. She goes from 40 ft, to 200 ft, the school destroyed by her growth.
15533222211111112111112212111212112121.title: Yes!

choices: She goes to show her 200 ft body to the town!
1553322221111111211111221211121211212122.title: Something else!

1553322221111111211111221211121212.content: Marco hugs Star's foot and says "Awesome!" then Star says "Toes bigger than the earth!" and wiggles her toes against his face. She smiles as she begins to grow, passing 40 ft, temporarily stopping at 50 ft. Her feet are now 12 ft 6 inches long! She smiles and says "A nice start! I'm huge!"
1553322221111111211111221211121212.title: Happiness!

choices: Touching Star's feet spreads the growth!
155332222111111121112.title: Something else!

1553322221111111211121.content: Is it as strong as Star's growth spurts?
1553322221111111211121.title: Touching Star's feet spreads the growth!

choices: Star tries to fix it, and succeeds!
Star tries to fix it, and something goes wrong.
15533222211211.content:
(WARNING, STORYLINE MAY TURN MATURE. CHARACTERS ARE 18+.)

Marco groans and says "Star, what are you doing?" as he looks over at her. She doesn't speak.

She suddenly blasts him with magic, causing him to gasp. He shot up from his short 5'6, up to 9 ft! "W-woah! What happened?" Star nervously asks.

Marco gulps, looking down at the 7 ft Mewni queen, who had a recent growth spurt. "What do you mean what happened? You made me huge!"

She looks down and says "I-I just meant to make you bigger down there! And maybe your muscles.. Maybe I can fix it!"
15533222211211.title: Story 1

choices: Star grows or Marco grows more!
155332222112112.content: How does it go wrong?
155332222112112.title: Star tries to fix it, and something goes wrong.

1553322221121121.title: Star grows or Marco grows more!

15533222211211211.content: Does she out grow the house?
15533222211211211.title: Grow herself

1553322221121122.content: Does star's wand malfunctions and they were different characters andvin a new world and have no idea what happend?
1553322221121122.title: Next!

1553322222.content: How about some cartoon bears that have been giants on their shows get to grow again?
1553322222.title: Nah.

1553322222111.content: How shall he make his wish?
1553322222111.title: A wish!

15533222221111.content: Bear sighed as he was told once again that he was too small for something. He decides to go on a walk. He trips and rolls down a hill, to a well. He peeks down into it and says "I've heard stories of magic wells that grant wishes!" then he tosses a coin in and yells out "I want to be bigger!"
15533222221111.title: Wishing well!

choices: He gains the power of the well!
155332222211112.content: Bear grins as he zooms up to 30 ft tall. He jumps and grins, but he accidentally crushes the wishing well. He gulps, worrying what would happen.
155332222211112.title: Fast growth.

1553322222111121.content: Bear blinked as he felt powerful. He looks down at his feet, smiling, saying "I wonder if bigger feet would be better for kickball. Then again, they're huge since I'm so big!" then he smiles, thinking of the times people talked about him having big feet. He loves having big feet. He even had Goldie rub them for him once! Suddenly, his feet grew three times as big. He grins, deciding...
1553322222111121.title: He gains the power of the well!

1553322222111122.content: The well began to rebuild itself. Bear smiles, stepping back so he doesn't crush it under his feet again. He lifts his foot up and says "Mama and papa did always say I had very big feet." with a grin.
1553322222111122.title: Nothing!

choices: He wishes for Goldie to grow too!
15533222221111222.title: Something else!

15533222222.content: How about the classic duo?
15533222222.title: Nah.

choices: Incredible growing Jerry! (Reserved for author of this chapter.)
155332222221.content: So, which will it be? A huge mouse? Or a tiny cat?
155332222221.title: Tom & Jerry!

155332222222.content: How about Greg Heffley from diary of a wimpy kid?
155332222222.title: Nope!

info.description:
CN XD interactive rules:

No cussing.

Please start with:
Spongebob
Sonic The Hedgehog
Miles "Tails" Prower
Emily the country mouse

No blood or gore.

No nudity or sex (other than gender)

One villain is allowed:
Dirty Bubble / Man Ray
gizmo / BOSS

An interactive for even FOX 46 Carolinas to enjoy! Have Fun!

Growth / shrinking is wanted in this.

Animated Kids shows / live action shows only!
